name: Steam Chain
description:
WHEN HELP IS IN NEED, A HERO GRINDS TO THE TOP!

Face perilous hardships and solve mind-bending puzzles, all with the end goal in mind of freeing the city of Chrono Steel. You can use acrobatic moves, you can explore remote locals, but are you the hero we need?

  • It's Steampunk time! 
  • 500 grams of precision platforming.
  • 1 litre of logic puzzles.
  • Mix those two together and you get a pretty unique playstyle!
  • Unique fantasy world to explore.
  • Create platforms mid-air.
  • Use life-like gear interactions to solve puzzles.
  • Face tough challenges and free your people!

Like Super Meat Boy, but you play as a wanna-be engineer!

Standard Gamepad supported and recommended!
